job.title: NetSuite Senior Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOracle NetSuite is looking for an ambitious software engineer for our infrastructure teams to scale out our world leading cloud ERP system The NetSuite application is used by tens of thousands of customers to manage their day to day business operations The Infrastructure Visibility team offers tools and services to both internal stakeholders and external customers to monitor system health manage alerts debug issues and report on metrics via distributed tracing and opensource technologies We are on a mission to revolutionize how software can be analyzed and optimized We are constantly exploring techniques to do more with less and challenging the status quo We use some of the latest technologies to build the necessary tools to make software perform faster and provide application transparency to various end users As a part of the Infrastructure Visibility team you will help build out realtime system health and usage tracking while expanding our analytical capabilities to extract operational and usage insights across the NetSuite serviceltbrgtltbrgtHere are some of the cool products that we have builtltbrgtltbrgtKeynote httpswwwyoutubecomwatchvF0mTQVVRa4ampampstart602ampampend753ltbrgtltbrgtKeynote httpswwwyoutubecomwatchvTJuAJ4DRZEampampstart3720ampampend3882ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout YoultbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYou should be motivated to come up with innovative solutions that helps others extract operational ampamp usage insights You should enjoy writing production ready code that are testable maintainable and scalable You should be motivated to help other team members adopt good coding standards and enjoy having technical discussions You should have experience working with largescale software engineering system designltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob Responsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt Write production ready code for distributed systems and be committed to solid software engineering principles and test driven development ltligt ltligt Implement and leverage opensource technologies such as Elasticsearch Kafka or similar to improve our analytical capability ltligt ltligt Leverage your prior experiences to make sound design decisions and build scalable products for stakeholders and our customers ltligt ltligt Empower engineers with delightful webbased tools that allows for data exploration aggregation monitoring and alerting ltligt ltligt Be able to own processes end to end and be ready to fix errors when they surface  be committed to our customers success ltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt BS in Computer Science Computer Engineering or Equivalent ltligt ltligt 4 years of backend software engineering experience ltligt ltligt 4 years of Java or other object oriented programming experience ltligt ltligt NOSQL database experience or working with large data analytics ltligt ltligt Prior distributed tracing or production visibility experience ltligt ltligt Excellent at communicating in both technical and nontechnical contexts ltligt ltbrgtltulgtOracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin sexual orientation gender identity disability and protected veterans status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtDesign develop troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases applications tools networks etcltbrgtltbrgtAs a member of the software engineering division you will assist in defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing debugging or designing of software applications or operating systems Provide technical leadership to other software developers Specify design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needsltbrgtltbrgtDuties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment Fully competent in own area of expertise May have project lead role and or supervise lower level personnel BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area 4 years of software engineering or related experienceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtInnovation starts with inclusion at Oracle We are committed to creating a workplace where all kinds of people can be themselves and do their best work Its when everyones voice is heard and valued that we are inspired to go beyond whats been done before Thats why we need people with diverse backgrounds beliefs and abilities to help us create the future and are proud to be an affirmativeaction equal opportunity employerltbrgtltbrgtOracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin sexual orientation gender identity disability and protected veterans status age or any other characteristic protected by law Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law
